desc: Water from a mountain spring in Ohbanahara.

dictionary.lore: This water can be drawn from natural springs in the mountains of Ohbanahara. It is incredibly clear, yet also gives off a remarkable aroma. One theory holds that this spring water has mystical healing effects able to cure many diseases, and that it has healed numerous people that live near its source. Others contend that its location in the mountains does not limit its benefits to humans, and that many living things seek it out for the same reasons.

name: Aroma Water
